description:
The Clear Your Mortgage Calculator calculates your mortgage payments in an instant. 

The Mortgage Payment Calculator has 3 calculation options:
- Find out your monthly repayment mortgage payments 
- Find out your monthly interest only mortgage payments
- Find out how overpayments can affect the lifetime of your mortgage

The Clear Your Mortgage Calculator is great for anyone wishing to buy a property as it will quickly and easily give you your mortgage payments and enable you to switch between repayment and interest only, so you can easily compare your options.  

The calculator is also great for people who already have an existing mortgage who want to hopefully pay it off early with overpayments.  The calculator enables you to put in overpayments and see how this affects both the lifetime of your mortgage and also the amount of interest you will pay.

Note:While this our figures are checked for accuracy, we are not liable for any incorrect information included. We recommend that you make enquiries based on your own circumstances and, if necessary, take professional advice before entering into transactions.
